00074 Position::Position()
00075 {
00076     this->posX = 0;
00077     this->posY = 0;
00078 }
00079 
00085 Position::Position(int x, int y)
00086 {
00087     this->posX = x;
00088     this->posY = y;
00089 }
00090 
00095 Position::Position(const Position &pos)
00096 {
00097     this->posX = pos.posX;
00098     this->posY = pos.posY;
00099 }
00100 
00106 Position::Position(const Position &pos, Direction2 dir)
00107 {
00108     this->posX = pos.posX;
00109     this->posY = pos.posY;
00110     this->move(dir);
00111 }
00112 
00119 Position::Position(const Position &pos, int dx, int dy)
00120 {
00121     this->posX = pos.posX + dx;
00122     this->posY = pos.posY + dy;
00123 }
00124 
00129 Position &Position::operator=(const Position &pos)
00130 {
00131     if (this != &pos) {
00132         this->posX = pos.posX;
00133         this->posY = pos.posY;
00134     }
00135     return *this;
00136 }

00138 
00144 bool Position::move(Direction2 dir)
00145 {
00146     switch (dir) {
00147         case DIR2_INVALID:
00148             return true;
00149 
00150         case DIR2_NORTH:
00151             if (this->posY > 0) {
00152                 this->posY--;
00153                 return true;
00154             }
00155             break;
00156 
00157         case DIR2_NORTH_EAST:
00158             if (this->posX < WORLD_W - 1 && this->posY > 0) {
00159                 this->posX++;
00160                 this->posY--;
00161                 return true;
00162             }
00163         case DIR2_EAST:
00164             if (this->posX < WORLD_W - 1) {
00165                 this->posX++;
00166                 return true;
00167             }
00168             break;
00169 
00170         case DIR2_SOUTH_EAST:
00171             if (this->posX < WORLD_W -1 && this->posY < WORLD_H - 1) {
00172                 this->posX++;
00173                 this->posY++;
00174                 return true;
00175             }
00176             break;
00177 
00178         case DIR2_SOUTH:
00179             if (this->posY < WORLD_H - 1) {
00180                 this->posY++;
00181                 return true;
00182             }
00183             break;
00184 
00185         case DIR2_SOUTH_WEST: this->posX--; this->posY++; break;
00186             if (this->posX > 0 && this->posY < WORLD_H - 1) {
00187                 this->posX--;
00188                 this->posY++;
00189                 return true;
00190             }
00191             break;
00192 
00193         case DIR2_WEST:
00194             if (this->posX > 0) {
00195                 this->posX--;
00196                 return true;
00197             }
00198             break;
00199 
00200         case DIR2_NORTH_WEST:
00201             if (this->posX > 0 && this->posY > 0) {
00202                 this->posX--;
00203                 this->posY--;
00204                 return true;
00205             }
00206             break;
00207 
00208 
00209         default: NOT_REACHED();
00210     }
00211 
00212     // Movement was not possible, silently repair the position.
00213     if (this->posX < 0)        this->posX = 0;
00214     if (this->posX >= WORLD_W) this->posX = WORLD_W - 1;
00215     if (this->posY < 0)        this->posY = 0;
00216     if (this->posY >= WORLD_H) this->posY = WORLD_H - 1;
00217     return false;
00218 }
